title: Millennium Actress
description: From critically acclaimed director Kon Satoshi (Perfect Blue), comes the award-winning masterpiece, Millennium Actress. Known for his remarkable visual style, Kon seamlessly blends fantasy and reality into an exciting epic adventure of fate and destiny. Past and present collide as a film director discovers a mysterious key that unlocks the secrets of a legendary actress who vanished at the height of her brilliant career.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Historical>, <Genre -> Romance>]
